name: The Core (Noah Kuhn)
description:
THE CORE

Rotate about three axes to defend your core from the slowly-approaching pentagonal pyramids. Just a short game made for a Game Sprout with the prompt "guard."

Controls
W/S: rotate the inner-most (red) gimbal
A/D: rotate the middle (green) gimbal
Q/E: rotate the outer-most (blue) gimbal
Spacebar: shoot/start game

Hm, this music seems familiar...
https://soundcloud.com/noahnoahnoahnoahnoahnoah/business-incorporated
